name: MIRACLE
description:
Insights from the Dreaming Pool - Every moment is a miracle.

What is a miracle? Something incredible, an out of the blue  magical occurrence which will completely change your life?
 
What is a miracle for you?
 
It is a different thing for each of us. Breathing is a miracle, the fact that we’re alive is a miracle, our beautiful planet is an incredible miracle. When this card comes up for you define what is a miracle in the situation you are focusing on or seeking clarity in. What seems easy for some for others is an 
impossible dream. 

What would be a miracle for you now in this situation?

Often you have to reach the point of accepting that maybe this is never going to happen to me or for me. Whatever I do it just isn’t working. So then you let  go of wanting it. You don’t just pretend you let go or say you let go, you actually accept what is. You accept the lack or the difficult situation that you’re in. You accept whatever it is and all of the emotions that go with it. Breathe in who you are and where you are and how you are. Accept it all in this moment and Know This:

Acceptance is a door to the miracle of Release

The Dreaming Pool Oracle is a collaboration between artists Maia Mellier 🕸 🕷 (@maiamellier) & AEVIN (@aevin_io)
